question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central. At your current location, if the stairs in front of the ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are not within the field of view, what is the most relevant object in your field of view and where is this object?  
Choose:  
A. I can already see the stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central.  
B. The stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are not in view, but I see the facade of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central in the lower right part of my view.  
C. The stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central cannot be seen, but I see a pedestrian crossing in the lower part of my field of view.  
D. The stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central cannot be seen, but I see a high-rise building on the left side of my field of view.  
E. The stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are not in view, but I see the facade of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central in the middle of my view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The stairs in front of the ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are not visible in the current field of view. However, the facade of the ALL-STAR Cafe is clearly visible in the middle of the view, indicating that the agent is facing the cafe but not positioned to see the stairs yet.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 55)]
Option: E
Reason: From the initial position (0:00-0:07), the stairs in front of the ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are not visible. However, the facade of the ALL-STAR Cafe is clearly visible in the middle of the view (0:35-0:55), indicating that the agent is facing the cafe but not positioned to see the stairs yet. The provided answer is correct.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The stairs in front of the ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are not visible in the current field of view. However, the facade of the ALL-STAR Cafe is clearly visible in the middle of the view, indicating that the agent is facing the cafe but not positioned to see the stairs yet.
